verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In every heart there is a throne, It’s in a place that is reserved for God alone.
And as we live, it forms within, Built by the choices that are worthy of a king.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It’s made of mercy to the weak;
A voice that’s given to the one who cannot speak.
And of compassion to the poor,
Relief of suffering that others must endure.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In every heart…
In every kindly word we say,
Each time we bend the knee before the lord and pray,
The wounded soul we choose to love,
When we forgive and ask for mercy from above.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In every heart…
And every idol we refuse,
Each chain we break and every captive we set loose.
When we proclaim Your Holy Word,
And bring your light of truth into a fallen world.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Take your place, take your place, take your place, upon Your throne…
